document_data.name: Order of the Silver Lance
document_data.orgname: the Order of the Silver Lance
document_data.mainbody: The '''Order of the Silver Lance''' was a mercenary company based in [[Ormath]] in the [[Shining Plains]] and active in the [[Sea of Fallen Stars]] around [[1358 DR]]. They were a corp of medium cavalry.
document_data.Contracts: The Order took 100 [[gold piece]]s per day. They worked only for non-[[evil]] patrons and were always honorable and trustworthy.
document_data.Leadership: Their leader [[Thorivald]] the Grey was a famous paladin.
